pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AX Banner Generator### Usage```shellpip install ax-generate-banner --upgrade```Then:```pythonfrom ax_generate_banner.generate import Generateif __name__ == '__main__': generate = Generate( left_image='image-left.jpg', right_image=['img1.png', 'image-right.png'], text_header=["BEDS", "FLOORS", "SQ.FT"], text_data=["3", "43", "4863"], residence_title='Rukan Residences', font='alethiapro-regular.otf' ) generate.save('result.jpg')```![alt text](fonts/img.png "AX Generated Image Banner")
